ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so that we can glorify You much
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That we may sing Your praises much,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that we may abundantly extol Your glory;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “In order that we may profusely proclaim Your Purity.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That we may glorify You much,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So that we should glorify Thee much,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That we may glorify Thee much
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so that we may glorify You much
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That We may hallow Thee oft.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: so that we may glorify You greatly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That we may celebrate Thy praise without stint,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That we may glorify You much,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That we may glorify You much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That we may exalt You much
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:33] So that we may glorify You, [by making] glorifications, over and over again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That we may glorify Thee much) that we may pray to You much.
